metadata.dc:author: Herrero, M V
metadata.dc:description: The local effects induced as a consequence of applications of four external secretions from the spider Sphaerobothria hoffmanni were recorded. Macroscopic lesions were not found; the only local effect microscopically observed was a weak necrosis in the skeletal muscle in mice.
metadata.dc:title: Efectos locales de las secreciones externas de Sphaerobothria hoffmanni (Araneae: Theraphosidae) de Costa Rica.
[Local effects of the external secretions of Sphaerobothria hoffmanni (Araneae: Theraphosidae) from Costa Rica].
